content.question: Which of the following is true of both India and China in the period from 1945 to 1990 ?

choices.label: Both were colonies of a foreign power.
In the 1950s, leaders of both countries focused on industrial development.
Building an agricultural base was the top priority of both countries.
Both countries adopted free-trade policies in the 1960s.
Both societies quickly rejected traditional religious values.

content.answer: In the 1950s, leaders of both countries focused on industrial development.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
